biotools.summary: Panomicon (formerly Toxygates) is a web application for user-friendly analysis of multi-omics data (presently focusing on mRNA and mRNA-miRNA interaction data). It was originally developed for the Open TG-GATEs dataset but is now being used for more general purposes.

bioschemas.name: Panomicon
